trans-unit.source: This section contains information on and installation instructions for MariaDB binaries and packages.
trans-unit.target: 本节包含有关MariaDB二进制文件和软件包的信息以及安装说明。

trans-unit.source: This section describes some techniques that can help you use mysql more effectively.
trans-unit.target: 本节介绍一些可以帮助您更有效地使用 mysql 的技术。

trans-unit.source: This section is about securing your MariaDB installation. If you are looking for the list of security vulnerabilities fixed in MariaDB, see Security Vulnerabilities Fixed in MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 本节是关于保护MariaDB安装的。如果要查找MariaDB中已修复的安全漏洞列表，请参阅MariaDB中已修复的安全漏洞。

trans-unit.source: This section is about sequence objects. For details about the storage engine, see Sequence Storage Engine.
trans-unit.target: 本节介绍序列对象。有关存储引擎的详细信息，请参阅序列存储引擎。

trans-unit.source: This section is for installation-related items that are obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 本节是与安装相关的物品,已经过时了。

trans-unit.source: This section is for replication-related items that are obsolete
trans-unit.target: 本节为与复制有关的过时项目。

trans-unit.source: This section is for replication-related items that are obsolete. The information in these articles is old or outdated, but rather than throwing it away, we're preserving it here.
trans-unit.target: 本节是与复制相关的物品,已经过时了。这些文章中的信息是旧的或过时的,但我们没有将其丢弃,而是将其保存在这里。

trans-unit.source: This section shows how to setup and install all associated packages for MariaDB AX.
trans-unit.target: 本节介绍了如何设置和安装MariaDB AX的所有相关包。

trans-unit.source: This session screenshot demonstrates how EXECUTE IMMEDIATE affects status variables:
trans-unit.target: 此会话截图演示了EXECUTE IMMEDIATE如何影响状态变量。

trans-unit.source: This sets the signal point's activation counter to 3. Each execution decrements the counter. After the third execution the sync point becomes inactive.
trans-unit.target: 这将信号点的激活计数器设置为3,每次执行都会使计数器递减。第三次执行后,同步点就不活动了。

trans-unit.source: This setting stalls the SELECT until all current updates have been applied to the node. That is sufficient to guarantee that a previous write will be visible. The time cost is usually zero. However, a large UPDATE could lead to a delay. Because of RBR and parallel application, delays are likely to be less than on traditional replication. Zaitsev's blog
trans-unit.target: 这个设置会使SELECT停滞,直到所有当前的更新都被应用到节点上。这足以保证之前的写入将是可见的。时间成本通常为零。但是,一个大的UPDATE可能会导致延迟。由于RBR和并行应用,延迟可能比传统复制上的延迟要少。Zaitsev的博客

trans-unit.source: This shared library actually consists of two different plugins:
trans-unit.target: 这个共享库实际上由两个不同的插件组成。

trans-unit.source: This should allow your SSTs to be encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 这应该允许你的SSTs被加密。

trans-unit.target: 最后应该是:

trans-unit.target: 这应该指向libthrift-0.8.0.so。

trans-unit.source: This should produce storage/rocksdb/ha_rocksdb.so which is MyRocks storage engine in the loadable form.
trans-unit.target: 这应该产生 storage/rocksdb/ha_rocksdb.so ，它是可加载形式的MyRocks存储引擎。

trans-unit.source: This shows three thing for speeding up usage of GUIDs/UUIDs:
trans-unit.target: 这说明有三件事可以加快GUIDs/UUIDs的使用。

trans-unit.source: This simple form of the connection should work in most situations. Depending on your configuration, it may also be necessary to specify the port for the server or to force TCP mode:
trans-unit.target: 这种简单的连接形式应该在大多数情况下都可以使用。根据你的配置,可能还需要指定服务器的端口或强制TCP模式。

trans-unit.source: This simple setup does not bring HA in case the Spider Node is not available. In a production setup the number of Spider Nodes in the spider_link_mon_servers table should be at least 3 to get a majority consensus.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Spider Node 不可用，此简单设置不会带来HA 。在生产设置中，spider_link_mon_servers表中的“ Spider Nodes ”数应至少为3，以获得多数同意。

trans-unit.source: This situation could occur if the timeout for the init script was too short. For example, see MDEV-9382, a situation where the timeout was 30 seconds, but the server was taking 48 seconds to start.
trans-unit.target: 如果初始化脚本的超时时间太短，则可能会发生这种情况。例如，请参阅MDEV-9382，这种情况是超时为30秒，但服务器需要48秒才能启动。

trans-unit.source: This sort of construct is therefore not safe to use in replication that is not row-based, as there could be different results on the master and the slave.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在非基于行的复制中使用这种构造并不安全，因为在主服务器和从服务器上可能会有不同的结果。

trans-unit.source: This special column is called “n” and its value is the row number starting from 1. It is purely a virtual table and no data file exists corresponding to it and to its index. It is possible to specify the columns of a VIR table but they must be CONNECT special columns or virtual columns. For instance:
trans-unit.target: 此特殊列称为“ n”，其值是从1开始的行号。它纯粹是一个虚拟表，不存在与其相对应的数据及其索引。可以指定VIR表的列，但是它们必须是CONNECT特殊列或虚拟列。例如：

trans-unit.source: This specific to IPv4 (32 bit, a la '196.168.1.255'). It can handle anywhere from 'nothing assigned' (1 row) to 'everything assigned' (4B rows) 'equally' well. That is, to ask the question "who owns '11.22.33.44'" is equally efficient regardless of how many blocks of IP addresses exist in the table. (OK, caching, disk hits, etc may make a slight difference.) The one function that can vary is the one that reassigns a range to a new owner. Its speed is a function of how many existing ranges need to be consumed, since those rows will be DELETEd. (It helps that they are, by schema design, 'clustered'.)
trans-unit.target: 这是对IPv4(32位,如'196.168.1.255')的特殊处理。它可以 "同样 "很好地处理从 "没有分配"(1行)到 "所有分配"(4B行)的任何地方。也就是说,问 "谁拥有'11.22.33.44'"这个问题,无论表中存在多少块IP地址,都是同样有效的。(好吧,缓存、磁盘点击率等可能会有些许差别。)可以变化的一个功能是将一个范围重新分配给新的所有者。它的速度是需要消耗多少现有范围的函数,因为这些行将被DELETEd。(根据模式设计,它们是'集群'的,这是有帮助的)。

trans-unit.source: This stall detection feature is implemented by creating a timer thread that periodically checks if any of the thread groups are stalled. There is only a single timer thread for the entire thread pool. The thread_pool_stall_limit system variable defines the number of milliseconds between each stall check performed by the timer thread. The default value is 500. It can be changed dynamically with SET GLOBAL. For example:
trans-unit.target: 通过创建一个计时器线程来实现此停顿检测功能，该线程定期检查是否有任何线程组被停顿。整个线程池只有一个计时器线程。所述 thread_pool_stall_limit 系统变量定义由计时器线程执行每个档位检查之间的毫秒数。默认值为 500 。可以使用 SET GLOBAL 动态更改。例如：

trans-unit.source: This standard is relevant when discussing the TLS and cryptography libraries used by MariaDB. Some of these libraries have been certified to meet the standards set by FIPS 140-2.
trans-unit.target: 在讨论MariaDB使用的TLS和加密库时,这个标准是相关的。其中一些库已经被认证为符合FIPS 140-2规定的标准。

trans-unit.source: This state occurs after a query's execution is complete. If the query's execution time exceeds long_query_time, then Slow_queries is incremented, and if the slow query log is enabled, then the query is logged. If the SERVER_AUDIT plugin is enabled, then the query is also logged into the audit log at this stage. If the userstats plugin is enabled, then CPU statistics are also updated at this stage.
trans-unit.target: 查询执行完成后，将发生此状态。如果查询的执行时间超过 long_query_time ，则 Slow_queries 递增，如果启用慢查询日志，则记录查询。如果启用了 SERVER_AUDIT 插件，则此阶段还将查询记录到审核日志中。如果启用了 userstats 插件，则此阶段还将更新CPU统计信息。

trans-unit.source: This statement activates INSERT triggers.
trans-unit.target: 该语句激活INSERT 触发器。

trans-unit.source: This statement activates INSERT and DELETE triggers. See Trigger Overview for details.
trans-unit.target: 该语句激活INSERT和DELETE触发器。有关详细信息，请参见触发器概述。

trans-unit.source: This statement activates INSERT and UPDATE triggers. See Trigger Overview for details.
trans-unit.target: 该语句激活INSERT和UPDATE触发器。有关详细信息，请参见触发器概述。

trans-unit.source: This statement can also be used to rename a table. For details see RENAME TABLE.
trans-unit.target: 该语句也可以用于重命名表。有关详细信息，请参见 RENAME TABLE 。

trans-unit.source: This statement can be used instead of INSTALL PLUGIN even when the library contains only one plugin:
trans-unit.target: 即使库仅包含一个插件，也可以使用此语句代替 INSTALL PLUGIN ：

trans-unit.source: This statement can be used to change the characteristics of a stored procedure. More than one change may be specified in an ALTER PROCEDURE statement. However, you cannot change the parameters or body of a stored procedure using this statement. To make such changes, you must drop and re-create the procedure using either CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE (since MariaDB 10.1.3) or DROP PROCEDURE and CREATE PROCEDURE (MariaDB 10.1.2 and before).
trans-unit.target: 该语句可用于更改存储过程的特征。在 ALTER PROCEDURE 语句中可以指定多个更改。但是，您不能使用此语句更改参数或存储过程的主体。要进行此类更改，您必须使用CREATE或REPLACE PROCEDURE（自MariaDB 10.1.3起）或DROP PROCEDURE和CREATE PROCEDURE（MariaDB 10.1.2及更低版本）删除并重新创建该过程。

trans-unit.source: This statement can be used to change the characteristics of a stored function. More than one change may be specified in an ALTER FUNCTION statement. However, you cannot change the parameters or body of a stored function using this statement; to make such changes, you must drop and re-create the function using DROP FUNCTION and CREATE FUNCTION.
trans-unit.target: 该语句可用于更改存储函数的特征。在 ALTER FUNCTION 语句中可以指定多个更改。但是，您不能使用此语句更改参数或存储函数的主体。要进行此类更改，必须使用DROP FUNCTION和CREATE FUNCTION删除并重新创建该函数。

trans-unit.source: This statement can be used with both local variables and user-defined variables.
trans-unit.target: 该语句可与局部变量和用户定义的变量一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This statement causes Aria to rebuild the table using the ROW_FORMAT table option. In the process, with the new default setting, it encrypts the table when it writes to disk.
trans-unit.target: 该语句使Aria使用 ROW_FORMAT table选项重建表。在此过程中，使用新的默认设置，它将在写入磁盘时对表进行加密。

trans-unit.source: This statement changes the definition of a view, which must exist. The syntax is similar to that for CREATE VIEW and the effect is the same as for CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW if the view exists. This statement requires the CREATE VIEW and DROPprivileges for the view, and some privilege for each column referred to in the SELECT statement. As of MariaDB 5.1.23, ALTER VIEW is allowed only to the definer or users with the SUPER privilege.
trans-unit.target: 该语句更改视图的定义，该视图必须存在。语法类似于CREATE VIEW的语法，并且如果存在视图，其效果与 CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW 相同。该语句要求该 CREATE VIEW 具有CREATE VIEW和 DROP 特权，以及 SELECT 语句中所引用的每一列都有一些特权。从MariaDB 5.1.23开始， ALTER VIEW 只允许定义者或具有 SUPER 特权的用户使用。

trans-unit.source: This statement closes a previously opened cursor. The cursor must have been previously opened or else an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 该语句关闭先前打开的游标。游标必须先前已打开，否则会发生错误。

trans-unit.source: This statement creates a new trigger. A trigger is a named database object that is associated with a table, and that activates when a particular event occurs for the table. The trigger becomes associated with the table named tbl_name, which must refer to a permanent table. You cannot associate a trigger with a TEMPORARY table or a view.
trans-unit.target: 该语句创建一个新的触发器。触发器是与表相关联的命名数据库对象，并在表发生特定事件时激活。触发器与名为 tbl_name 的表相关联，该表必须引用一个永久表。您不能将触发器与 TEMPORARY 表或视图相关联。

trans-unit.source: This statement creates and schedules a new event. It requires the EVENT privilege for the schema in which the event is to be created.
trans-unit.target: 该语句创建并安排一个新事件。对于要在其中创建事件的架构，它要求具有 EVENT 特权。

trans-unit.source: This statement creates the definition of a server for use with the Spider, FEDERATED or FederatedX storage engine. The CREATE SERVER statement creates a new row within the servers table within the mysql database. This statement requires the SUPER privilege.
trans-unit.target: 该语句创建与Spider，FEDERATED或FederatedX存储引擎一起使用的服务器的定义。CREATE SERVER语句在mysql数据库的服务器表内创建新行。该语句需要SUPER特权。

trans-unit.source: This statement declares a cursor. Multiple cursors may be declared in a stored program, but each cursor in a given block must have a unique name.
trans-unit.target: 该语句声明一个游标。可以在存储程序中声明多个游标，但是给定块中的每个游标必须具有唯一的名称。

trans-unit.source: This statement displays the CREATE EVENT statement needed to re-create a given event, as well as the SQL_MODE that was used when the trigger has been created and the character set used by the connection.. To find out which events are present, use SHOW EVENTS.
trans-unit.target: 此语句显示重新创建给定事件所需的 CREATE EVENT 语句，以及创建触发器和连接所使用的字符集时使用的 SQL_MODE 。要了解存在哪些事件，请使用 SHOW EVENTS 。

trans-unit.source: This statement drops a trigger. The schema (database) name is optional. If the schema is omitted, the trigger is dropped from the default schema. Its use requires the TRIGGER privilege for the table associated with the trigger.
trans-unit.target: 该语句删除触发器。模式（数据库）名称是可选的。如果省略该模式，则从默认模式删除该触发器。它的使用要求与 TRIGGER 关联的表具有TRIGGER特权。

trans-unit.source: This statement drops the event named event_name. The event immediately ceases being active, and is deleted completely from the server.
trans-unit.target: 该语句删除名为 event_name 的事件。该事件立即停止活动，并已从服务器中完全删除。

trans-unit.source: This statement drops the user-defined function (UDF) named function_name.
trans-unit.target: 该语句删除名为 function_name 的用户定义函数（UDF）。

trans-unit.source: This statement fetches the next row (if a row exists) using the specified opencursor, and advances the cursor pointer.
trans-unit.target: 该语句使用指定的打开游标获取下一行（如果存在一行），并前进游标指针。

trans-unit.source: This statement has no effect if the server was not started with the --log-bin option to enable binary logging.
trans-unit.target: 如果未使用 --log-bin 选项启动服务器以启用二进制日志记录，则此语句无效。

trans-unit.source: This statement has the following semantics:
trans-unit.target: 该声明具有以下语义:

trans-unit.source: This statement installs an individual plugin from the specified library. To install the whole library (which could be required), use INSTALL SONAME.
trans-unit.target: 该语句从指定的库安装单个插件。要安装整个库（可能需要），请使用 INSTALL SONAME 。

trans-unit.source: This statement is a MariaDB extension that is available only for servers that have been built with debugging support. It displays a representation of the internal implementation of the named stored procedure. A similar statement, SHOW FUNCTION CODE, displays information about stored functions.
trans-unit.target: 该语句是MariaDB扩展，仅适用于使用调试支持构建的服务器。它显示了命名存储过程的内部实现。类似的语句 SHOW FUNCTION CODE 显示有关存储函数的信息。

trans-unit.source: This statement is a MariaDB extension. It returns characteristics of a stored procedure, such as the database, name, type, creator, creation and modification dates, and character set information. A similar statement, SHOW FUNCTION STATUS, displays information about stored functions.
trans-unit.target: 该语句是MariaDB扩展。它返回存储过程的特征，例如数据库，名称，类型，创建者，创建和修改日期以及字符集信息。类似的语句 SHOW FUNCTION STATUS 显示有关存储函数的信息。

trans-unit.source: This statement is a MariaDB extension. It returns the exact string that can be used to re-create the named stored procedure, as well as the SQL_MODE that was used when the trigger has been created and the character set used by the connection.. A similar statement, SHOW CREATE FUNCTION, displays information about stored functions.
trans-unit.target: 该语句是MariaDB扩展。它返回可用于重新创建命名存储过程的确切字符串，以及创建触发器和连接使用的字符集时使用的 SQL_MODE 。类似的语句 SHOW CREATE FUNCTION ，显示有关存储函数的信息。

trans-unit.source: This statement is a variant of UNINSTALL PLUGIN statement, that removes all plugins belonging to a specified plugin_library. See UNINSTALL PLUGIN for details.
trans-unit.target: 该语句是UNINSTALL PLUGIN语句的变体，它删除属于指定 plugin_library 的所有插件。有关详细信息，请参见UNINSTALL PLUGIN。

trans-unit.source: This statement is a variant of INSTALL PLUGIN. It installs allplugins from a given plugin_library. See INSTALL PLUGIN for details.
trans-unit.target: 该语句是 INSTALL PLUGIN 的变体。它从给定的 plugin_library 安装所有插件。有关详细信息，请参见 INSTALL PLUGIN 。

trans-unit.source: This statement is binary-safe and so is particularly useful for writing BLOB values to file. It can be used, for example, to copy an image or an audio document from the database to a file. SELECT ... INTO FILE can be used to save a text file.
trans-unit.target: 该语句是二进制安全的，因此对于将BLOB值写入文件特别有用。例如，它可用于将图像或音频文档从数据库复制到文件。SELECT ... INTO FILE可用于保存文本文件。

trans-unit.source: This statement is for use only when the master is started for the first time, and should never be used if any slaves are actively replicating from the binary log.
trans-unit.target: 该语句仅在第一次启动主服务器时使用，如果任何从服务器正在从二进制日志中主动复制，则永远不要使用该语句。

trans-unit.source: This statement is not accepted by CONNECT. The reason is that the column id being part of the partition function, changing its value may require the modified row to be moved to another partition. The way it is done by the partition engine is to delete the old row and to re-insert the new modified one. However, this is done in a way that is not currently compatible with CONNECT (remember that CONNECT supports UPDATE in a specific way, in particular for the table type MYSQL) This limitation could be temporary. Meanwhile the workaround is to manually do what is done above,
trans-unit.target: CONNECT不接受这条语句,因为列id是分区函数的一部分,改变它的值可能需要将修改后的行移到另一个分区。原因是列id是分区函数的一部分,改变它的值可能需要将修改后的行移动到另一个分区。分区引擎的做法是删除旧的行,重新插入新的修改行。然而,这种方式目前与CONNECT不兼容(请记住,CONNECT支持UPDATE的方式很特殊,特别是对于表类型MYSQL)这种限制可能是暂时的。同时,变通的方法是手动做上面的工作。

trans-unit.source: This statement is not used in stored procedures, triggers, or events. LEAVE can be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 在存储过程，触发器或事件中不使用此语句。可以改用LEAVE。

trans-unit.source: This statement is similar to SHOW WARNINGS, except that instead of displaying errors, warnings, and notes, it displays only errors.
trans-unit.target: 该语句类似于SHOW WARNINGS，除了只显示错误而不显示错误，警告和注释。

trans-unit.source: This statement is similar to SHOW CREATE PROCEDURE but for stored functions.
trans-unit.target: 该语句类似于 SHOW CREATE PROCEDURE ,但用于存储函数。

trans-unit.source: This statement is similar to SHOW PROCEDURE STATUS but for stored functions.
trans-unit.target: 该语句类似于 SHOW PROCEDURE STATUS ,但用于存储函数。

trans-unit.source: This statement is to be run on a slave and provides status information on essential parameters of the replication slave threads.
trans-unit.target: 该语句将在从属服务器上运行，并提供有关复制从属线程基本参数的状态信息。

trans-unit.source: This statement is used to declare local variables within stored programs. To provide a default value for the variable, include a DEFAULT clause. The value can be specified as an expression (even subqueries are permitted); it need not be a constant. If the DEFAULT clause is missing, the initial value is NULL.
trans-unit.target: 该语句用于在存储的程序中声明局部变量。要提供变量的默认值，请包含 DEFAULT 子句。该值可以指定为表达式（甚至允许子查询）；它不必是常数。如果缺少 DEFAULT 子句，则初始值为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: This statement is used to drop a stored procedure. That is, the specified routine is removed from the server along with all privileges specific to the procedure. You must have the ALTER ROUTINE privilege for the routine. If the automatic_sp_privileges server system variable is set, that privilege and EXECUTE are granted automatically to the routine creator - see Stored Routine Privileges.
trans-unit.target: 该语句用于删除存储过程。也就是说，指定的例程以及该过程的所有特权都已从服务器中删除。您必须对该例程具有 ALTER ROUTINE 特权。如果设置了 automatic_sp_privileges 服务器系统变量，则将特权和 EXECUTE 自动授予例程创建者-请参见“ 存储的例程特权”。

trans-unit.source: This statement is used to exit the flow control construct that has the given label. The label must be in the same stored program, not in a caller procedure. LEAVE can be used within BEGIN ... END or loop constructs (LOOP, REPEAT, WHILE). In Stored Procedures, Triggers and Events, LEAVE can refer to the outmost BEGIN ... END construct; in that case, the program exits the procedure. In Stored Functions, RETURN can be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 该语句用于退出具有给定标签的流控制构造。标签必须位于同一存储程序中，而不是在调用程序中。 LEAVE 可以在BEGIN ... END或循环构造（LOOP，REPEAT，WHILE）内使用。在“ 存储过程，触发器和事件”中，LEAVE可以引用最外面的BEGIN ... END构造。在这种情况下，程序将退出该过程。在存储的函数中，可以使用RETURN代替。

trans-unit.source: This statement is valid only when the slave threads are not running. Otherwise, it produces an error.
trans-unit.target: 只有当从属线程没有运行时,该语句才有效。否则,会产生一个错误。

trans-unit.source: This statement lists the GRANT statement or statements that must be issued to duplicate the privileges that are granted to a MariaDB user account. The account is named using the same format as for the GRANT statement; for example, 'jeffrey'@'localhost'. If you specify only the user name part of the account name, a host name part of '%' is used. For additional information about specifying account names, see GRANT.
trans-unit.target: 该语句列出了必须发出的 GRANT 语句，以复制授予MariaDB用户帐户的特权。该帐户使用与 GRANT 语句相同的格式命名。例如，“ jeffrey'@'localhost ”。如果仅指定帐户名的用户名部分，则使用主机名部分' % '。有关指定帐户名的其他信息，请参见 GRANT 。

trans-unit.source: This statement opens a cursor which was previously declared with DECLARE CURSOR.
trans-unit.target: 该语句将打开一个游标，该游标以前是用DECLARE CURSOR声明的。

trans-unit.source: This statement removes a single installed plugin. To uninstall the whole library which contains the plugin, use UNINSTALL SONAME. You cannot uninstall a plugin if any table that uses it is open.
trans-unit.target: 该语句删除一个已安装的插件。要卸载包含插件的整个库，请使用UNINSTALL SONAME。如果打开了使用该插件的任何表，则无法卸载该插件。

trans-unit.source: This statement renames one or more tables or views, but not the privileges associated to them.
trans-unit.target: 该语句重命名一个或多个表或视图,但不重命名与它们相关的权限。

trans-unit.source: This statement requires SELECT and INSERT privileges for the table.
trans-unit.target: 该语句需要对该表具有SELECT和INSERT特权。

trans-unit.source: This statement requires the EVENT privilege. In MySQL 5.1.11 and earlier, an event could be dropped only by its definer, or by a user having the SUPER privilege.
trans-unit.target: 该语句需要 EVENT 特权。在MySQL 5.1.11及更早版本中，事件只能由其定义者或具有 SUPER 特权的用户删除。

trans-unit.source: This statement requires the EVENT privilege. When a user executes a successful ALTER EVENT statement, that user becomes the definer for the affected event.
trans-unit.target: 该语句需要 EVENT 特权。当用户执行成功的 ALTER EVENT 语句时，该用户将成为受影响事件的定义者。

trans-unit.source: This statement requires the RELOAD and the LOCK TABLES privileges.
trans-unit.target: 该语句需要 RELOAD 和 LOCK TABLES 特权。

trans-unit.source: This statement requires the SUPER or the REPLICATION_CLIENT privilege.
trans-unit.target: 该语句需要 SUPER 或 REPLICATION_CLIENT 特权。

trans-unit.source: This statement sets the transaction isolation level or the transaction access mode globally, for the current session, or for the next transaction:
trans-unit.target: 该语句为当前会话或下一个事务全局设置事务隔离级别或事务访问模式。

trans-unit.source: This statement shows a CREATE TRIGGER statement that creates the given trigger, as well as the SQL_MODE that was used when the trigger has been created and the character set used by the connection.
trans-unit.target: 该语句显示创建给定触发器的 CREATE TRIGGER 语句，以及创建触发器时使用的 SQL_MODE 和连接使用的字符集。

trans-unit.source: This statement shows a CREATE VIEW statement that creates the given view, as well as the character set used by the connection when the view was created. This statement also works with views.
trans-unit.target: 该语句显示创建给定视图的 CREATE VIEW 语句，以及创建视图时连接使用的字符集。该语句也适用于视图。

trans-unit.source: This statement shows how much memory is used for performance_schema tables and internal buffers.
trans-unit.target: 该语句显示了 performance_schema 表和内部缓冲区使用了多少内存。

trans-unit.source: This statement skips the next N events from the master. This is useful for recovering from replication stops caused by a statement.
trans-unit.target: 该语句跳过主服务器的下 N 个事件。这对于从语句引起的复制停止中恢复很有用。

trans-unit.source: This statement supports three different XML formats:
trans-unit.target: 本语句支持三种不同的XML格式。

trans-unit.source: This statement takes a snapshot of the master and copies it to the slave. It updates the values of MASTER_LOG_FILE and MASTER_LOG_POS so that the slave starts replicating from the correct position. Any table and database exclusion rules specified with the --replicate-*-do-* and --replicate-*-ignore-* options are honored. --replicate-rewrite-db is not taken into account because a user could use this option to set up a non-unique mapping such as --replicate-rewrite-db="db1->db3" and --replicate-rewrite-db="db2->db3", which would confuse the slave when loading tables from the master.
trans-unit.target: 该语句获取主服务器的快照并将其复制到从服务器。它更新 MASTER_LOG_FILE 和 MASTER_LOG_POS 的值，以便从站从正确的位置开始复制。遵守使用 --replicate-*-do-* 和 --replicate-*-ignore-* 选项指定的任何表和数据库排除规则。 --replicate-rewrite-db 未考虑在内，因为用户可以使用此选项来设置非唯一映射，例如 --replicate-rewrite-db="db1->db3" 和 --replicate-rewrite-db="db2->db3" ，这会在从主服务器加载表时混淆从服务器。

trans-unit.source: This statement will create a new table called t2_placeholder that has the same schema structure as t2, but it does not use partitioning and it contains no rows.
trans-unit.target: 该语句将创建一个名为 t2_placeholder 的新表，该表具有与 t2 相同的架构结构，但不使用分区并且不包含任何行。

trans-unit.source: This statement will display the file in tabular format.
trans-unit.target: 此语句将以表格形式显示文件。

trans-unit.source: This status variable counts the occurrence of DDL statements. This is a slave-side counter for optimistic parallel replication.
trans-unit.target: 这个状态变量对DDL语句的发生进行计数。这是一个用于优化并行复制的从侧计数器。

trans-unit.source: This status variable counts the occurrence of non-transactional event groups. This is a slave-side counter for optimistic parallel replication.
trans-unit.target: 该状态变量对非事务性事件组的发生进行计数。这是一个用于优化并行复制的从侧计数器。

trans-unit.source: This status variable counts the occurrence of transactional event groups. This is a slave-side counter for optimistic parallel replication.
trans-unit.target: 该状态变量对事务性事件组的发生进行计数。这是一个用于优化并行复制的从侧计数器。

trans-unit.source: This status variable is only meaningful on Unix.
trans-unit.target: 此状态变量仅在Unix上有意义。

trans-unit.source: This step is not necessary when upgrading to MariaDB 10.2.5 or later. Omitting it can make the upgrade process far faster. See MDEV-12289 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 升级到MariaDB 10.2.5或更高版本时，无需执行此步骤。省略它可以使升级过程更快。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-12289。

trans-unit.source: This step might take some time. You may proceed steps 7)-11) in the meanwhile in another terminal window.
trans-unit.target: 这一步可能需要一些时间。您可以在另一个终端窗口中继续执行步骤7)-11)。

trans-unit.source: This step should remove the InfiniDB alias's from the /root/.bashrc file. But double check that file and if the alais still exist, edit the file manually to remove them.
trans-unit.target: 这一步应该从/root/.bashrc文件中删除InfiniDB的别名。但要仔细检查该文件,如果alais仍然存在,请手动编辑文件以删除它们。

trans-unit.source: This storage engine can be useful, for example, if you want to run complex filtering rules on a slave without incurring any overhead on a master. The master can run a BLACKHOLE storage engine, with the data replicated to the slave for processing.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果要在从属服务器上运行复杂的过滤规则而又不会在主服务器上产生任何开销，则此存储引擎会很有用。主服务器可以运行 BLACKHOLE 存储引擎，并将数据复制到从服务器进行处理。

trans-unit.source: This storage engine cannot be used for log tables"
trans-unit.target: 该存储引擎不能用于日志表"

trans-unit.source: This storage engine supports table partitioning, MariaDB virtual columns and permits defining special columns such as ROWID, FILEID, and SERVID.
trans-unit.target: 该存储引擎支持表分区，MariaDB虚拟列，并允许定义特殊列，例如ROWID，FILEID和SERVID。

trans-unit.source: This storage engine supports table partitioning, MariaDB virtual columns and permits defining special columns such as ROWID, FILEID, and SERVID.
trans-unit.target: 该存储引擎支持表分区、MariaDB虚拟列,并允许定义特殊列,如ROWID、FILEID和SERVID。

trans-unit.source: This storage engine was removed from the 5.1 tree at some point, before the birth of MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB诞生之前,这个存储引擎在某些时候从5.1树上被移除。

trans-unit.source: This structure seems at first view far from being tabular. However, modern database management systems, including MariaDB, implement something close to the relational model and work on tables that are structurally not hierarchical but tabular with rows and columns.
trans-unit.target: 这种结构乍看之下,似乎远非表格式。然而,现代的数据库管理系统,包括MariaDB,实现了一些接近关系模型的东西,并且在表上工作,结构上不是分层的,而是有行和列的表。

trans-unit.source: This system variable contains the GTID of the last transaction applied to the database by the server's slave threads for each replication domain. This system variable's value is automatically updated whenever a slave thread applies an event group. This system variable's value can also be manually changed by users, so that the user can change the GTID position of the slave threads.
trans-unit.target: 该系统变量包含每个复制域的服务器从属线程应用于数据库的最后一个事务的GTID 。只要从属线程应用事件组，此系统变量的值就会自动更新。用户也可以手动更改此系统变量的值，以便用户可以更改从属线程的GTID位置。

trans-unit.source: This system variable contains the GTID of the last transaction applied to the database for each replication domain.
trans-unit.target: 这个系统变量包含了每个复制域应用到数据库的最后一个事务的GTID。

trans-unit.source: This system variable defaults to the file ibdata1, and it defaults to a minimum size of 12M, and it defaults with the autoextend attribute enabled.
trans-unit.target: 该系统变量缺省为文件 ibdata1 ，缺省缺省值为 12M ，并且缺省情况下启用了 autoextend 属性。

trans-unit.source: This system variable does not affect the calculation of persistent statistics.
trans-unit.target: 此系统变量不会影响持久性统计信息的计算。

trans-unit.source: This system variable is no longer needed, because the server can automatically convert large memory-based temporary tables into disk-based temporary tables when they exceed the value of the tmp_memory_table_size system variable.
trans-unit.target: 不再需要此系统变量，因为当服务器将超过内存的大型临时表超过 tmp_memory_table_size 系统变量的值时，它们可以自动将其转换为基于磁盘的临时表。

trans-unit.source: This system variable is only available when the plugin is a debug build.

trans-unit.source: This system variable is only meaningful on Unix.
trans-unit.target: 该系统变量仅在Unix上有意义。

trans-unit.source: This system variable is only meaningful on Windows.
trans-unit.target: 该系统变量仅在Windows上有意义。

trans-unit.source: This system variable is only meaningful when parallel replication is configured (i.e. when slave_parallel_threads > 0).
trans-unit.target: 仅当配置了并行复制时（即， slave_parallel_threads > 0 时），此系统变量才有意义。

trans-unit.source: This system variable is set to en_US by default, which means that error messages are in English by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此系统变量设置为 en_US ，这意味着默认情况下错误消息为英文。

trans-unit.source: This system variable is used along with the lc_messages_dir system variable to construct the path to the error messages file.

trans-unit.target: 该系统变量的默认值为 5 。

trans-unit.source: This table structure ensures that all active or on-hold users have distinct names, but as soon as a user is deleted, his name is no longer part of the uniqueness constraint, and another user may get the same name.

trans-unit.source: This table type can be used to transform the result of another table or view (called the source table) into a pivoted table along “pivot” and “facts” columns. A pivot table is a great reporting tool that sorts and sums (by default) independent of the original data layout in the source table.
trans-unit.target: 该表类型可用于将另一个表或视图（称为源表）的结果转换为沿“数据透视”和“事实”列的数据透视表。数据透视表是一种出色的报告工具，它默认情况下对源表中的原始数据布局进行排序和求和（默认情况下）。

trans-unit.source: This table type is still under development. It has significant advantages over the JSON type to access MongoDB collections. Firstly, the access being direct, tables are always up to date whether the collection has been modified by another application. Performance wise, it is much faster than JSON, because most processing is done by MongoDB on BSON, its internal representation of JSON data, which is designed to optimize all operations. Note that using the MongoDB C Driver is about twice as fast as using the MongoDB Java Driver.
trans-unit.target: 这个表类型还在开发中。与JSON类型相比,它有显著的优势来访问MongoDB集合。首先,由于是直接访问,无论该集合是否被其他应用修改过,表总是最新的。从性能上看,它比JSON快得多,因为大部分处理都是MongoDB在BSON上完成的,BSON是它对JSON数据的内部表示,它的设计是为了优化所有操作。需要注意的是,使用MongoDB C驱动的速度是使用MongoDB Java驱动的两倍左右。

trans-unit.source: This technique is used when the number of rows in the subquery result is above a certain limit. The technique creates special indexes on some of the columns of the temporary table, and merges them by alternative scanning of each index thus performing an operation similar to set-intersection.
trans-unit.target: 当子查询结果中的行数超过一定限度时,就会使用这种技术。该技术在临时表的一些列上创建特殊的索引,并通过对每个索引的替代扫描将其合并,从而执行类似于集交的操作。

trans-unit.source: This translates into some responsibility for the user. The MariaDB GTID replication is fully asynchronous, and fully flexible in how it can be configured. This makes it possible to use it in ways where the assumption that binlog sequence is the same on all servers is violated. In such cases, when changing master, GTID will still attempt to continue at the point of current GTID in the new binlog.
trans-unit.target: 这就转化为用户的一些责任。MariaDB GTID复制是完全异步的,并且在如何配置方面完全灵活。这使得它可以在违反binlog序列在所有服务器上都是相同的假设的情况下使用。在这种情况下,当更换主站时,GTID仍然会尝试在新的binlog中的当前GTID点继续。

trans-unit.source: This type allows defining a table as a list of tables of any engine and type. This is more flexible than multiple tables that must be all of the same file type. This type does, but is more powerful than, what is done with the MERGE engine.

trans-unit.source: This understood by both parsers, and even if this function would return NULL executed by MariaDB, it does return the current date when executed by SQLite3. But this begins to become too trickery so to overcome all these restrictions, and permit to have all types of commands executed by the data source, CONNECT provides a specific ODBC table subtype described now.
trans-unit.target: 这两个解析器都能理解,即使这个函数在MariaDB中执行时返回NULL,但在SQLite3中执行时,它确实会返回当前日期。但是这开始变得太狡猾了,所以为了克服所有这些限制,并允许数据源执行所有类型的命令,CONNECT提供了一个特定的ODBC表子类型,现在描述一下。

trans-unit.source: Thread pools are most efficient in situations where queries are relatively short and the load is CPU-bound, such as in OLTP workloads. If the workload is not CPU-bound, then you might still benefit from limiting the number of threads to save memory for the database memory buffers.
trans-unit.target: 线程池在查询时间相对较短且负载受CPU限制的情况下效率最高,例如在OLTP工作负载中。如果工作负载不受CPU限制,那么限制线程数量以节省数据库内存缓冲区的内存,可能还是会有好处的。

trans-unit.source: Thus the extent to which group commit is effective at reducing the number of flush system calls on the binary log can be determined by the ratio between these two status variables. Binlog_commits will always be as equal to or greater than Binlog_group_commits. The greater the difference is between these status variables, the more effective group commit was at reducing flush overhead.
trans-unit.target: 因此，可以通过这两个状​​态变量之间的比率来确定组提交有效减少二进制日志上的刷新系统调用次数的程度。 Binlog_commits 将始终等于或大于 Binlog_group_commits 。这些状态变量之间的差异越大，组提交在减少刷新开销方面越有效。

trans-unit.source: To accelerate input/output, CONNECT uses when possible a read/write mode by blocks of n rows, n being the value given in the BLOCK _ SIZE option of the Create Table, or a default value depending on the table type. This is automatic for fixed files (FIX, BIN, DBF or VEC), but must be specified for variable files (DOS , CSV or FMT ).
trans-unit.target: 为了加快输入/输出速度，CONNECT在可能的情况下使用n行块的读/写模式，n是“创建表”的BLOCK _ SIZE选项中给出的值，或者取决于表类型的默认值。这对于固定文件（FIX，BIN，DBF或VEC）是自动的，但是必须为可变文件（DOS，CSV或FMT）指定。

trans-unit.source: To accelerate the indexing process, CONNECT makes an index structure in memory from the index file. This can be done by reading the index file or using it as if it was in memory by “file mapping”. On enabled versions, file mapping is used according to the boolean connect_indx_map system variable. Set it to 0 (file read) or 1 (file mapping).
trans-unit.target: 为了加快索引编制过程，CONNECT通过索引文件在内存中建立了索引结构。这可以通过读取索引文件或通过“文件映射”将其用作内存中的文件来完成。在启用的版本上，根据boolean connect_indx_map系统变量使用文件映射。将其设置为0（读取文件）或1（文件映射）。

trans-unit.source: To avoid compressing and uncompressing pages too many times, InnoDB tries to keep both compressed and uncompressed pages in the buffer pool when there is enough room. This results in a bigger cache. When there is not enough room, an adaptive LRU algorithm is used to decide whether compressed or uncompressed pages should be evicted from the buffer: for CPU-bound workloads, the compressed pages are evicted first; for I/O-bound workloads, the uncompressed pages are evicted first. Of course, when necessary, both the compressed and uncompressed version of the same data can be evicted from the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 为了避免多次压缩和解压缩页面，InnoDB会在有足够空间的情况下尝试将压缩和未压缩的页面都保留在缓冲池中。这导致更大的缓存。如果没有足够的空间，则使用自适应LRU算法来确定是否应从缓冲区中清除压缩或未压缩的页面：对于CPU密集型工作负载，首先清除压缩的页面；否则，将其清除。对于受I / O约束的工作负载，首先将未压缩的页面逐出。当然，必要时，可以从缓冲区中清除同一数据的压缩版本和未压缩版本。

trans-unit.source: To avoid data type changes resulting from CONVERT TO CHARACTER SET, use MODIFY on the individual columns instead. For example:
trans-unit.target: 为避免由于 CONVERT TO CHARACTER SET 而导致数据类型更改， MODIFY 对各个列使用MODIFY。例如：

trans-unit.source: To avoid difficulties with the backslash character, you can change the wildcard escape character using ESCAPE in a LIKE expression. The argument to ESCAPE must be a single-character string.
trans-unit.target: 为避免反斜杠字符带来的麻烦，可以在 LIKE 表达式中使用 ESCAPE 更改通配符转义字符。 ESCAPE 的参数必须是一个单字符字符串。

trans-unit.source: To avoid extracting entire tables from an ODBC source, which can be a lengthy process, CONNECT extracts the "compatible" part of query WHERE clauses and adds it to the ODBC query. Compatible means that it must be understood by the data source. In particular, clauses involving scalar functions are not kept because the data source may have different functions than MariaDB or use a different syntax. Of course, clauses involving sub-select are also skipped. This will transfer eventual indexing to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 为了避免从ODBC源提取整个表,这可能是一个漫长的过程,CONNECT提取查询WHERE子句的 "兼容 "部分,并将其添加到ODBC查询中。兼容意味着它必须被数据源所理解。特别是,涉及标量函数的子句不会被保留,因为数据源可能有与MariaDB不同的函数或使用不同的语法。当然,涉及子选择的子句也会被跳过。这将把最终的索引转移给数据源。

trans-unit.source: To avoid multiple serializing and parsing, the Jbin functions should be used as parameters to other functions. Indeed, they do not serialize the memory document tree, but return a structure allowing the receiving function to have direct access to the memory tree. This saves the serialize-parse steps otherwise needed to pass the argument and removes the need to reallocate the memory of the binary tree, which by the way is 6 to 7 times the size of the json string. For instance:
trans-unit.target: 为了避免多次序列化和解析,Jbin函数应该作为其他函数的参数使用。事实上,它们并不对内存文件树进行序列化,而是返回一个允许接收函数直接访问内存树的结构。这样就省去了传递参数所需的序列化-解析步骤,也不需要重新分配二进制树的内存,顺便说一下,二进制树的大小是json字符串的6到7倍。例如

trans-unit.source: To avoid problems, a DECLARE HANDLER statement is generally used. The HANDLER should handler the 1329 error, or the '02000' SQLSTATE, or the NOT FOUND error class.
trans-unit.target: 为了避免出现问题，通常使用DECLARE HANDLER语句。处理程序应该处理程序中的1329错误，或者“02000” SQLSTATE或NOT FOUND错误类。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this problem, OpenSSL developers decided that TLSv1.3 cipher suites should not be affected by the normal cipher-selecting API. This means that ssl_cipher system variable has no effect on the TLSv1.3 cipher suites.

trans-unit.source: To be a MyISAM replacement. This is possible because Aria can also be run in non-transactional mode, supports the same row formats as MyISAM, and supports or will support all major features of MyISAM.
trans-unit.target: 要成为MyISAM的替代品。之所以能够做到这一点,是因为Aria也可以在非事务模式下运行,支持与MyISAM相同的行格式,并且支持或将支持MyISAM的所有主要功能。

trans-unit.source: To be a good candidate for tabular representation, an INI file should have often the same keys in all sections. In practice, many files commonly found on computers, such as the win.ini file of the Windows directory or the my.ini file cannot be viewed that way because each section has different keys. In this case, a second way is to regard the file as a table having one row per section key and whose columns can be the section name, the key name, and the key value.
trans-unit.target: 为了成为表格表示的良好候选者，INI文件的所有部分通常应具有相同的键。实际上，由于每个部分具有不同的键，因此无法以这种方式查看计算机上常见的许多文件，例如Windows目录的win.ini文件或my.ini文件。在这种情况下，第二种方法是将文件视为一个表，该表每个节键具有一行，并且其列可以是节名，键名和键值。

trans-unit.source: To be able to do a majority of the backup with the minimum possible server locks. Especially for transactional tables (InnoDB, MyRocks etc) there is only need for a very short block of new commits while copying statistics and log tables.

trans-unit.source: To be ready for a crash, a transactional engine such as InnoDB will record what it is doing to a log file. To make that somewhat less costly, the log file is sequentially written. If the log files you have (there are usually 2) fill up because the delete is really big, then the undo information spills into the actual data blocks, leading to even more I/O.
trans-unit.target: 为了做好崩溃的准备,像InnoDB这样的事务性引擎会把它正在做的事情记录到一个日志文件中。为了让这个成本降低一些,日志文件是按顺序写入的。如果你的日志文件(通常有2个)因为删除量真的很大而被填满,那么撤销信息就会溢出到实际数据块中,导致更多的I/O。

trans-unit.source: To deal with failure on COMMIT, design your code so you can redo the SQL statements in the transaction without messing up other data. For example, move "normalization" statements out of the main transaction; there is arguably no compelling reason to roll them back if the main code rolls back.

trans-unit.source: To install MariaDB Galera Cluster by compiling it from source, you will have to compile both MariaDB Server and the Galera wsrep provider library. For some information on how to do this, see the pages at Installing Galera From Source. The pages at Compiling MariaDB From Source and Galera Cluster Documentation: Building Galera Cluster for MySQL may also be helpful. When compiling MariaDB 10.1 or earlier and you want to enable Galera Cluster support, be sure to set set -DWITH_WSREP=ON and -DWITH_INNODB_DISALLOW_WRITES=ON when running cmake. When compiling MariaDB 10.2 or later, it is enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 要通过从源代码进行编译来安装MariaDB Galera Cluster，您将必须同时编译MariaDB Server和Galera wsrep提供程序库。有关如何执行此操作的某些信息，请参阅“ 从源代码安装Galera”中的页面。在该页面编译MariaDB的从源代码和加莱拉集群文档：mysql构建加莱拉集群也可能会有所帮助。当编译MariaDB 10.1或更早版本并且要启用Galera Cluster支持时，请确保在运行cmake时将set -DWITH_WSREP=ON 和 -DWITH_INNODB_DISALLOW_WRITES=ON 设置为set 。编译MariaDB 10.2或更高版本时，默认情况下启用。

trans-unit.source: To manage network communication between the application and our deployment and between the database servers we use two MaxScale servers, one to handle the back-end data streaming and the other to handle selective query proxying from your application. In scaling for the network load, you can add MaxScale servers to the first to handle a larger database write load or to the second to manage a greater number of queries from your application.
trans-unit.target: 为了管理应用程序和我们的部署之间以及数据库服务器之间的网络通信,我们使用两台MaxScale服务器,一台用于处理后端数据流,另一台用于处理来自您的应用程序的选择性查询代理。在针对网络负载进行扩展时,您可以在第一台服务器上添加MaxScale服务器,以处理更大的数据库写入负载,或者在第二台服务器上添加MaxScale服务器,以管理来自您的应用程序的更多查询。

trans-unit.source: To mitigate this concern, Galera Cluster allows you to encrypt data in transit as it is replicated between each cluster node using the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol. TLS was formerly known as Secure Socket Layer (SSL), but strictly speaking the SSL protocol is a predecessor to TLS and, that version of the protocol is now considered insecure. The documentation still uses the term SSL often and for compatibility reasons TLS-related server system and status variables still use the prefix ssl_, but internally, MariaDB only supports its secure successors.
trans-unit.target: 为了减轻这种担忧，当使用传输层安全性（TLS）协议在每个群集节点之间复制数据时，Galera Cluster允许您对传输中的数据进行加密。 TLS以前称为安全套接字层（SSL），但严格来说，SSL协议是TLS的前身，并且该协议版本现在被认为是不安全的。文档仍然经常使用SSL术语，并且出于兼容性原因，与TLS相关的服务器系统和状态变量仍使用前缀 ssl_ ，但是在内部，MariaDB仅支持其安全后继。

trans-unit.source: To mitigate this concern, MariaDB allows you to encrypt data in transit between the server and clients using the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol. TLS was formerly known as Secure Socket Layer (SSL), but strictly speaking the SSL protocol is a predecessor to TLS and, that version of the protocol is now considered insecure. The documentation still uses the term SSL often and for compatibility reasons TLS-related server system and status variables still use the prefix ssl_, but internally, MariaDB only supports its secure successors.
trans-unit.target: 为了减轻这种担忧，MariaDB允许您使用传输层安全性（TLS）协议对服务器和客户端之间传输的数据进行加密。 TLS以前称为安全套接字层（SSL），但严格来说，SSL协议是TLS的前身，并且该协议版本现在被认为是不安全的。文档仍然经常使用SSL术语，并且出于兼容性原因，与TLS相关的服务器系统和状态变量仍使用前缀 ssl_ ，但是在内部，MariaDB仅支持其安全后继。

trans-unit.source: To mitigate this concern, MariaDB allows you to encrypt data in transit between the server and clients using the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol. TLS was formerly known as Secure Socket Layer (SSL), but strictly speaking the SSL protocol is a predecessor to TLS and, that version of the protocol is now considered insecure. The documentation still uses the term SSL often and for compatibility reasons TLS-related server system and status variables still use the prefix ssl_, but internally, MariaDB only supports its secure successors.
trans-unit.target: 为了减轻这种担忧,MariaDB允许您使用传输层安全(TLS)协议对服务器和客户端之间传输的数据进行加密。TLS的前身是安全套接字层(SSL),但严格来说,SSL协议是TLS的前身,而且,该版本的协议现在被认为是不安全的。文档中仍然经常使用SSL这个术语,出于兼容性的考虑,TLS相关的服务器系统和状态变量仍然使用ssl_这个前缀,但是在内部,MariaDB只支持它的安全继承者。

trans-unit.source: To mitigate this concern, MariaDB allows you to encrypt replicated data in transit between masters and slaves using the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol. TLS was formerly known as Secure Socket Layer (SSL), but strictly speaking the SSL protocol is a predecessor to TLS and, that version of the protocol is now considered insecure. The documentation still uses the term SSL often and for compatibility reasons TLS-related server system and status variables still use the prefix ssl_, but internally, MariaDB only supports its secure successors.
trans-unit.target: 为了减轻这种担忧，MariaDB允许您使用传输层安全性（TLS）协议对在主服务器和从服务器之间传输的复制数据进行加密。 TLS以前称为安全套接字层（SSL），但严格来说，SSL协议是TLS的前身，并且该协议版本现在被认为是不安全的。文档仍然经常使用SSL术语，并且出于兼容性原因，与TLS相关的服务器系统和状态变量仍使用前缀 ssl_ ，但是在内部，MariaDB仅支持其安全后继。

trans-unit.source: To mitigate this with MariaDB Replication, set the secure_timestamp system variable to YES on the slave. When set, the slave uses its own system clock when applying to the row log, meaning that the master can retry as many times as needed without causing a conflict. The retries generate new historical rows with new values for the row_start and row_end columns.
trans-unit.target: 要通过MariaDB复制减轻这种情况，请将从属服务器上的 secure_timestamp 系统变量设置为 YES 。置位时，从机在应用于行日志时会使用自己的系统时钟，这意味着主机可以根据需要重试多次，而不会引起冲突。重试会为 row_start 和 row_end 列生成具有新值的新历史行。

trans-unit.source: To optimize the usage of the join buffers within the limit set by join_buffer_space_limit, one should use the optimizer switchoptimize_join_buffer_size=on. When this flag is set to 'off' (default until MariaDB 10.4.2), the size of the used join buffer is taken directly from the join_buffer_size system variable. When this flag is set to 'on' (default from MariaDB 10.4.3) then the size of the buffer depends on the estimated number of rows in the partial join whose records are to be stored in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 为了在 join_buffer_space_limit 设置的限制内优化连接缓冲区的使用，应该使用优化器开关 optimize_join_buffer_size=on 。当此标志设置为“ off”（默认值直到MariaDB 10.4.2为止）时，使用的连接缓冲区的大小直接从join_buffer_size系统变量获取。当此标志设置为“ on”（MariaDB 10.4.3的默认设置）时，缓冲区的大小取决于部分连接中其记录将存储在缓冲区中的估计行数。

trans-unit.source: To read information from a condition, the CONDITION keyword must be specified and it must be followed by the condition number. trans-unit.source: To summarize:
trans-unit.target: 总结一下:

trans-unit.source: To support this, we need the usual name binding support in sp_pcontext (similar to variables and conditions) to keep track on declared cursor names, and a corresponding run-time mechanism in sp_rcontext. Cursors are lexically scoped like everything with a body or BEGIN/END block, so they are pushed and poped as usual (see conditions and variables above). The basic operations on a cursor are OPEN, FETCH and CLOSE, which will each have a corresponding instruction. In addition, we need instructions to push a new cursor (this will encapsulate the LEX of the SELECT statement of the cursor), and a pop instruction: - sp_instr_cpush Push a cursor to the sp_rcontext. This instruction contains the LEX for the select statement - sp_instr_cpop Pop a number of cursors from the sp_rcontext. - sp_instr_copen Open a cursor: This will execute the select and get the result set in a sepeate memroot. - sp_instr_cfetch Fetch the next row from the in-memory result set. The instruction contains a list of the variables (frame offsets) to set. - sp_instr_cclose Free the result set.
trans-unit.target: 为了支持这一点,我们需要在sp_pcontext中提供通常的名称绑定支持(类似于变量和条件)来跟踪已声明的游标名称,并在sp_rcontext中提供相应的运行时机制。游标的词法范围就像所有带有body或BEGIN/END块的东西一样,所以它们会像往常一样被推送和弹出(参见上面的条件和变量)。对游标的基本操作是OPEN、FETCH和CLOSE,每个操作都会有相应的指令。此外,我们还需要推送新游标的指令(这将封装游标的SELECT语句的LEX),以及弹出指令:-sp_instr_cpush 将一个游标推送到sp_rcontext中。这条指令包含select语句的LEX-sp_instr_cpop 从sp_rcontext中弹出若干游标。-sp_instr_copen 打开一个游标。这将执行选择并在sepeate memroot中得到结果集.-sp_instr_cfetch 从内存中的结果集中获取下一条记录。该指令包含一个要设置的变量列表(帧偏移量)。-sp_instr_cclose 释放结果集。

trans-unit.source: To turn off the doublewrite buffer, set the innodb_doublewrite system variable to 0. This is safe on filesystems that write pages atomically - that is, a page write fully succeeds or fails. But with other filesystems, it is not recommended for production systems. An alternative option is atomic writes. See atomic write support for more details.
trans-unit.target: 要关闭双写缓冲区，请将innodb_doublewrite系统变量设置为 0 。这在原子地写页面的文件系统上是安全的-也就是说，页面写完全成功或失败。但是对于其他文件系统，不建议将其用于生产系统。另一种选择是原子写入。有关更多详细信息，请参见原子写入支持。

trans-unit.source: To upgrade between minor versions of MariaDB on Linux/Unix (for example from MariaDB 10.3.12 to MariaDB 10.3.13), the following procedure is suggested:
trans-unit.target: 要在Linux / Unix的次要版本的MariaDB之间升级（例如，从MariaDB 10.3.12到MariaDB 10.3.13），建议执行以下过程：

trans-unit.source: To upgrade the UDF's shared library, first run a DROP FUNCTION statement, then upgrade the shared library and finally run the CREATE FUNCTION statement. If you upgrade without following this process, you may crash the server.
trans-unit.target: 要升级UDF的共享库，请首先运行DROP FUNCTION语句，然后升级共享库，最后运行CREATE FUNCTION语句。如果不遵循此过程进行升级，则可能使服务器崩溃。

trans-unit.source: To use SphinxSE with MariaDB you need to first download and install Sphinx.
trans-unit.target: 要将SphinxSE与MariaDB一起使用，您需要先下载并安装Sphinx。

trans-unit.source: To use INSTALL PLUGIN, you must have the INSERT privilege for the mysql.plugin table.
trans-unit.target: 要使用 INSTALL PLUGIN ，您必须对 mysql.plugin 表具有 INSERT privilege 。

trans-unit.source: To use INSTALL SONAME, you must have the INSERT privilege for the mysql.plugin table.
trans-unit.target: 要使用 INSTALL SONAME ，您必须对 mysql.plugin 表具有 INSERT privilege 。

trans-unit.source: To use LOAD DATA FROM MASTER, the replication account that is used to connect to the master must have the RELOAD and SUPER privileges on the master and the SELECT privilege for all master tables you want to load. All master tables for which the user does not have the SELECT privilege are ignored by LOAD DATA FROM MASTER. This is because the master hides them from the user: LOAD DATA FROM MASTER calls SHOW DATABASES to know the master databases to load, but SHOW DATABASES returns only databases for which the user has some privilege. On the slave side, the user that issues LOAD DATA FROM MASTER must have privileges for dropping and creating the databases and tables that are copied.
trans-unit.target: 要使用 LOAD DATA FROM MASTER ，用于连接到主数据库的复制帐户必须具有对主数据库的 RELOAD 和 SUPER 特权，以及要加载的所有主数据库表的 SELECT 特权。 LOAD DATA FROM MASTER 将忽略用户不具有 SELECT 特权的所有主表。这是因为主服务器向用户隐藏了它们： LOAD DATA FROM MASTER 调用 SHOW DATABASES 来知道要加载的主数据库，但是 SHOW DATABASES 仅返回用户具有某些特权的数据库。在从属方， LOAD DATA FROM MASTER 发出LOAD DATA的用户 必须具有删除和创建复制的数据库和表的特权。

trans-unit.source: To use REPLACE, you must have both the INSERT and DELETEprivileges for the table.
trans-unit.target: 要使用 REPLACE ，您必须同时具有表的 INSERT 和 DELETE 特权。

trans-unit.source: To use UNINSTALL PLUGIN, you must have the DELETE privilege for the mysql.plugin table.
trans-unit.target: 要使用 UNINSTALL PLUGIN ，您必须对mysql.plugin表具有DELETE特权。

trans-unit.source: To use UNINSTALL SONAME, you must have the DELETE privilege for the mysql.plugin table.
trans-unit.target: 要使用 UNINSTALL SONAME ，您必须对 mysql.plugin 表具有DELETE特权。

trans-unit.source: To use mysqlhotcopy, you must have read access to the files for the tables that you are backing up, the SELECT privilege for those tables, the RELOAD privilege (to be able to execute FLUSH TABLES), and the LOCK TABLES privilege (to be able to lock the tables).
trans-unit.target: 要使用 mysqlhotcopy ，您必须具有对正在备份的表的文件的读取访问权限，这些表的SELECT 特权，RELOAD特权（能够执行FLUSH TABLES）和LOCK TABLES特权（能够锁定表格）。

trans-unit.source: To use BKA/BKAH join algorithms for InnoDB/MyISAM, one must set the optimizer switch mrr to 'on'. When using these algorithms for InnoDB/MyISAM the overall performance of the join operations can be dramatically improved if the optimizer switch mrr_sort_keys is set 'on'.
trans-unit.target: 要对InnoDB / MyISAM使用BKA / BKAH连接算法，必须将优化器开关 mrr 设置为“ on”。当将这些算法用于InnoDB / MyISAM时，如果将优化程序开关 mrr_sort_keys 设置为“ on”，则可以显着提高联接操作的整体性能。

trans-unit.source: To use GET DIAGNOSTICS, it is important to know how the diagnostics area is structured. It has two sub-areas: the statement information area and the error conditions information area. For details, please refer to the diagnostics area page.
trans-unit.target: 要使用GET DIAGNOSTICS，了解诊断区域的结构非常重要。它具有两个子区域：语句信息区域和错误条件信息区域。有关详细信息，请参阅诊断区域页面。

trans-unit.source: To use MariaDB Galera Cluster, there are two primary packages that you need to install:
trans-unit.target: 要使用MariaDB Galera Cluster,有两个主要的包需要安装。

trans-unit.source: To use MariaDB we will need to edit the configuration file to change the appropriate option, and then restart the container.
trans-unit.target: 要使用MariaDB,我们需要编辑配置文件来更改相应的选项,然后重新启动容器。

trans-unit.source: To use SecuRich features, its stored procedures should be used instead of the usual security-related SQL statements. For example, drop_user() should be used instead of DROP USER. However, if a combination of SecuRich procedure and normal SQL statements is used, SecuRich can reconcile its tables with the system tables.
trans-unit.target: 要使用SecuRich功能，应使用其存储过程，而不是通常的与安全性相关的SQL语句。例如，应该使用drop_user（）代替DROP USER。但是，如果结合使用SecuRich过程和常规SQL语句，SecuRich可以将其表与系统表进行协调。

trans-unit.source: To use Spider, you need two or more instances of MariaDB, typically running on separate hosts. The Spider node is the MariaDB server that receives queries from your application. It then processes these queries, connecting to one or more data nodes. The data nodes are the MariaDB servers that actually store the table data.
trans-unit.target: 要使用Spider,你需要两个或更多的MariaDB实例,通常运行在不同的主机上。Spider节点是MariaDB服务器,它接收来自应用程序的查询。然后它处理这些查询,连接到一个或多个数据节点。数据节点是实际存储表数据的MariaDB服务器。

trans-unit.source: To verify the server's certificate, clients and utilities will check the Common Name (CN) attribute located in the Subject field of the certificate against the server's host name and IP address. If the Common Name (CN) matches either of those, then the certificate is verified.
trans-unit.target: 为了验证服务器的证书，客户端和实用程序将对照服务器的主机名和IP地址检查位于证书的“ 主题”字段中的“ 公用名（CN）”属性。如果公用名（CN）匹配任何一个，则验证证书。

You can select from the new table, for example:

trans-unit.source: To view the module configuration of all nodes and their statuses use getModuleConfig on mcsadmin, or simply use mcsadmingetModuleConfig from the operating system prompt.
trans-unit.target: 要查看所有节点的模块配置及其状态使用getModuleConfig上mcsadmin，或简单地使用mcsadmin getModuleConfig从操作系统提示。

trans-unit.source: To view the network configuration of all nodes and their statuses use getSystemNetworkConfig on mcsadmin, or simply use mcsadmingetSystemNetworkConfig from the operating system prompt.
trans-unit.target: 要查看所有节点的网络配置及其状态使用getSystemNetworkConfig上mcsadmin，或简单地使用mcsadmin getSystemNetworkConfig从操作系统提示。

trans-unit.source: To view the process status, use the getProcessStatus command in mcsadmin, or simply use mcsadmingetProcessStatus from the operating system prompt. The table below shows the available system and server statuses.
trans-unit.target: 要查看进程状态，请使用mcsadmin中的getProcessStatus命令，或者从操作系统提示符处简单地使用mcsadmin getProcessStatus。下表显示了可用的系统和服务器状态。

trans-unit.source: To view the storage configuration, use the getStorageConfig command in mcsadmin, or simply use mcsadmingetStorageConfig from the operating system prompt. This will provide information on DBRoots and which PM they are assigned to, if any.
trans-unit.target: 查看存储配置，使用getStorageConfig在命令mcsadmin，或简单地使用mcsadmin getStorageConfig从操作系统提示。这将提供有关DBRoots以及它们分配给哪个PM（如果有）的信息。

trans-unit.source: To work in live mode the system boots from a usb stick (or CD/DVD) and runs in RAM without touching the system's harddisk drive.
trans-unit.target: 要在实时模式下工作,系统从U盘(或CD/DVD)启动,并在RAM中运行,而不接触系统的硬盘驱动器。

trans-unit.source: To write logs into tables, the log_output server system variable is used. Allowed values are FILE, TABLE and NONE. It is possible to specify multiple values, separated with commas, to write the logs into both tables and files. NONE disables logging and has precedence over the other values.
trans-unit.target: 要将日志写入表，使用log_output服务器系统变量。允许的值为 FILE ， TABLE 和 NONE 。可以指定多个值（用逗号分隔），以将日志写入表和文件中。 NONE 禁用日志记录，并且优先于其他值。

trans-unit.source: TokuDB has been included with MariaDB since MariaDB 5.5.34 and MariaDB 10.0.6 and does not require separate installation. Proceed straight to Check for Transparent HugePage Support on Linux. For older versions, see the distro-specific instructions below.
trans-unit.target: 自MariaDB 5.5.34和MariaDB 10.0.6起，TokuDB已包含在MariaDB中，并且不需要单独安装。直接继续检查Linux上对透明HugePage的支持。对于较旧的版本，请参见下面的发行版特定说明。

trans-unit.source: TokuDB is available on the following distributions:
trans-unit.target: TokuDB 可在以下发行版上使用。

trans-unit.source: TokuDB is not the default storage engine.
trans-unit.target: TokuDB 不是默认的存储引擎。

trans-unit.source: TokuDB requires the libjemalloc library (currently version 3.3.0 or greater).
trans-unit.target: TokuDB 需要 libjemalloc 库(当前版本为 3.3.0 或更高)。

trans-unit.source: TokuDB status variables
trans-unit.target: TokuDB状态变量

trans-unit.source: TokuDB will be installed until someone executes UNINSTALL SONAME.
trans-unit.target: 在有人执行UNINSTALL SONAME之前，将安装TokuDB。
